name: Project Follower
description:
Small project I worked on for a local game jam. The premise was to make something "spooky" within a set time period. Project was made with Unity in about 3 hours while helping other groups. Instructions are outlined on the main screen.

The goal of the game is to find 5 white lights spread around the map while avoiding a single red light that follows you. The longer the game goes on the faster the red light will move. If it catches you the game ends.
